summary: This code seems to be checking if there is a way to create new tools on equivalent items and then suggesting to get a PDF for further reading. If a similar pattern is found in the PDF, it suggests that something will happen ("boom").

details.comment: This code seems to be checking if there is a way to create new tools on equivalent items and then suggesting to get a PDF for further reading. If a similar pattern is found in the PDF, it suggests that something will happen ("boom").
details.content:
check if there's a way to create new tools on equivalent things.
get me a pdf and let's read. if there's similar pattern then boom.
